articles.title: Aniket Ghosh
articles.contents:
Aniket Ghosh Website

              Aniket Ghosh
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        Resume
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        GitHub
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            Bio
            A results-oriented engineer with over 5 years of
            experience, blending technical expertise and business acumen
            through an MBA. Proven track record of driving
            transformative change in the power industry. Experienced
            with major electric utility companies in India and fintech
            startups in Singapore. Strong understanding of business
            aspects of electric utility sector. Committed to continuous
            learning. Passionate about new technologies and eager to
            contribute in dynamic environments.
            
            
            Experience
            Pand.ai | Product
            Manager Intern | May 2022 - November 2022 | Singapore
            Huasing
            Construction & Trading Pte Ltd. | Site
            Support Associate | March 2021 - September 2021 Singapore |
            Singapore
            CESC
            Limited | Engineer | July 2018 - February 2020
            | Kolkata, India
            Sterlite
            Power | Associate Manager | March 2014 - July
            2018 | New Delhi, India
            Ishaani
            Electronics Pvt Ltd. | Graduate Trainee | June
            2013 - February 2014 | Kolkata, India
            
            
            Education
            Singapore
            Management University | M.B.A. | August 2021 -
            January 2023 | Singapore
            IE
            Business School | MBA Exchange Program,
            Strategic Management | October 2022 | Madrid, Spain
            National Power
            Training Institute | Post Graduate Diploma
            (Transmission & Distribution) | March 2014 - August 2014
            | Bengaluru, India
            Kalyani Government
            Engineering College | B.Tech (Electrical
            Engineering) | August 2008 - September 2012 | Kalyani,
            India
